mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by macPSH.macWorkTime DESC) rank ,mac.machineName ,macPSH.macWorkTime ,macPSH.macProdNum FROM machineinfo mac LEFT JOIN( SELECT macSH.machineCode , SUM(datediff(SECOND,macSH.startTime,macSH.endTime)) macWorkTime ,COUNT(1) macProdNum from machinestatushistory macSH WHERE macSH.status = 1 AND macSH.startTime IS NOT NULL AND macSH.endTime IS NOT NULL AND CONVERT(varchar(100),macSH.startTime,23) BETWEEN CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(WEEK,-1, GETDATE()),23) AND CONVERT(varchar(100),GETDATE(), 23) GROUP BY macSH.machineCode ) macPSH ON mac.machineCode = macPSH.machineCode WHERE mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 ORDER BY macPSH.macWorkTime DESC

SELECT mac.machineName ,macPArm.alarmMsg ,macPArm.knifeNum ,macPArm.occurrenceTime FROM machineinfo mac INNER JOIN( select macArm.machineCode ,macArm.alarmMsg ,macArm.knifeNum ,MIN(macArm.occurrenceTime) occurrenceTime FROM machinealarmhistory macArm WHERE ASCII(macArm.alarmMsg) > 0 AND macArm.occurrenceTime BETWEEN DATEADD(MINUTE, -15, GETDATE()) AND GETDATE() GROUP BY macArm.machineCode ,macArm.alarmMsg ,macArm.knifeNum ) macPArm ON mac.machineCode = macPArm.machineCode WHERE mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 ORDER BY macPArm.occurrenceTime DESC;

SELECT mac.machineName ,macKni.knifePosition ,macKni.totalCount ,macKni.currentLife FROM machineinfo mac INNER JOIN( SELECT kni.machineCode ,kni.knifePosition ,kni.totalCount ,kniL.currentLife FROM knifeinfo kni LEFT JOIN knifelife kniL ON kniL.machineCode = kni.machineCode AND kniL.knifeNum = kni.knifePosition WHERE kni.status = 1 ) macKni ON mac.machineCode = macKni.machineCode WHERE mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 ORDER BY macKni.machineCode ,macKni.knifePosition;

select mac.machineName ,broH.knifeDiameter ,COUNT(1) as brokenNum from brokenhistory broH with(nolock) join machineinfo mac with(nolock) on mac.machineCode = broH.machineCode where broH.bBroken=1 AND CONVERT(varchar(100),broH.brokenTime,23) BETWEEN CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(MONTH,-1, GETDATE()),23) AND CONVERT(varchar(100),GETDATE(), 23) AND mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 group by mac.machineName,broH.knifeDiameter order by mac.machineName,broH.knifeDiameter
